mapper.select: SELECT NAME.NAME, MAIN.AMOUNT, DATE.DATE from ( ( SELECT NAME FROM CP WHERE DATE BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to} GROUP BY NAME ) AS NAME CROSS JOIN ( SELECT DATE FROM CP WHERE DATE BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to} GROUP BY DATE ) AS DATE ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT NAME, SUM(AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT, DATE FROM CP WHERE DATE BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to} GROUP BY NAME, DATE ) AS MAIN ON MAIN.NAME = NAME.NAME AND MAIN.DATE = DATE.DATE ORDER BY NAME.NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CP ( ISIN_CODE, ISSUER_CODE, NAME, BOND_UNIT, AMOUNT, DATE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{isinCode}, #{issuerCode}, #{name}, #{bondUnit}, #{amount}, #{date}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
